conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: What the... where am I? My head's all fuzzy...

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: What on earth are you babbling about? Use your words.

conversation.speaker: player
conversation.text: Meow. Meow meow meow meow! (with a sense of urgency)

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Wait, I know you. You're an apprentice from the Fablewoods, arent you? Gee, sucks they couldn't send a more articulate one...

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Chin up, soldier. You still have ways to go. Here, take this with you as a token of my appreciation.

conversation.speaker: potion
conversation.text: You have receive a Bottomless Potion. You feel rejuvenated just holding it. Remember to use it unsparingly!

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: I can feel my magic dwindling. The Fablewoods must be suffering...

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Go! Not too far from here is the Red Witch; she has my sister. I will return to the forest and do what I can.
